reviews.sentence: Josh. Booked here a week before for 2 nights. When we arrived the young black haired Caucasian with glasses at the front was short with us and rudely spoken. We got our keys and went straight to get something to eat and bring back. we arrived 40 mins later back the hotel. When we brought our luggage up and opened the door what we found was saddening. Crumbs on the floor and stains. a bad musky smell along with stains on the beds. we went straight to the front immediately and asked if we could have our money returned and we would look for a hotel elsewhere. once again the young man at the front was rude and tried in Noway to help us he told us he could move us to another room and if we left we would still be charged 50 percent of one night and that we had been their an hour already. I pleaded with him that we had went first to get something to eat and had not seen the room till now and he would not listen. So another guy from the front desk took us to show us another room which when he walked in with us I immediately showed him a threading needle laying on the floor and once again looked like the room had not been cleaned properly and was in pot condition. And I was very upset this time and I told him please return our money and he refused. So we lost 530 dollars and we did not even stay. me and my wife have never experienced anything like this with a hotel or even remotely close to this in our life. we are sorry to post this but we were done very wrong and we would like to advise anyone else to be very cautious and check your room immediately when you go to this hotel or they will put you in bad conditions and still takeyour money and claim you have been their an hour already.

the renovations have not reached the floor and room i was asignedthis review is from what i experienced not what i could have experiencedgod Has its own parking garage. Internet is fast10th floor has a view. Nearby public transportation. Numerous points of interests close byit is right next to downtown LAA lot pillows per bed. bad Carpet is dirty. Holes in walls covered using cardboard. Bathroom floor has dark spots. The bathroom is tiny. The toilet is an inch away from the tub. There was a cherry on the ground in the closet. There was an empty beer can left behind. at least the sheets look like they were washed welTV is outdated. 310 would not recommend.

Great staff. Building is barely habitable. No individual room heat or air. Centralized. Staff is friendly and welcoming. Do not stay in an unrenovated room. They are dirty old and should not be booked. Bad experience being asked if you want to upgrade for 20 more because unrenovated rooms should not be used for guests.

3 days too many. Stayed here for the BET EXPERIENCE BET AWARD WEKENDNice view from 12th floor 1201 Bathroom is like a closet no counter space in bathroom small room tiny shower back hurting after 3 nights no room service option no bar inside hotel no refrigerator 30 per day for Valet adds up and is ridiculous Easy UBER ride to STAPLES 5 MINUTES.

Clean hotel and friendly staff. However under construction and 2 broken elevators. Took 10 minutes to get from floor 8 to lobby. I do not mind inconvenience and construction but maybe offer up some discounts. Coupons for food somewhere nearby. Very scary surrounding area so can not go out alone after dark. Almost like a prison when the sun goes down. No food no snacks no vending can not leave. Website says bus stop right outside. Been here 2 days still can not find the bus stop. Even if I did can not get on cuz no card u can only acquire 12 mile opposite direction at station. PUT THAT ON THE WEBSITE.

Located in a shady area in downtown with renovation going on in the lobby and things hanging down from the ceiling ready to drop on the guests. Room was OK clean very tiny for the price they charged per night. There was no kitchenette. No heater it gets chilly in the night in November. overall bad experience.

Pleasantly surprised. The hotel when I stayed was under construction in places. It had some signboards of what was coming soon that I did not get to experience. However I dug the old fashioned vibe of the room and it was VERY clean. The only real downside to the room was that the folks next door were incredibly loud and the walls are just so thin. Also could hear a lot of noise outside in the neighborhood. The hotel recommended a cafe next door for meals which was very good loved the brunch. This is not somewhere to stay if you are looking for a plush experience. it is very boutique and hip. The view was also really nice could see downtown and the hillside with the Hollywood sign and the Griffith observatory. Could definitely use some improvements but seems like they are working on it. Would stay again to see what the post construction improvements are like. Staff was awesome and super nice and helpful.
Great bang for the buck. Very modern and hip good for singles and younger people. The location seems like it can be sketchy at times but did not have any bad experiences while on my stay.

Far Exceeded My Expectations. After reading a lot of negative reviews about this hotel I was hesitant about booking but I am one who likes to experience things for myself and said why not. After my experience at the Mayfair I do not understand one bit why this hotel has so many bad reviews. I think that the bad reviews are due to the lack of research guests put in before booking the hotel. Yes they are under construction so of course the place is not going to look it is best but I was not uncomfortable and it did not hinder my stay or experience. I think a lot of guests who go into booking this hotel and complain are the same people who are looking for convenience. There is no restaurant bar pool or gym but I was completely fine with that because a hotel for me is just a place to sleep. My boyfriend and I were attending The Classic West music festival at Dodgers Stadium and we were out or the room for most of the day. so all we needed it for was to sleep and shower. And to comment on the bathroom yes it is small and the doors will lead you to mistakenly think that the doors lead into a closet rather than a bathroom but it serves its purpose. There are also neighboring restaurants that are in walking distance. I thought it was fun because it forced up to walk around and not just stay inside the hotel for food and entertainment it was our own mini adventure. Overall my stay was enjoyable with no complaints. I hope to book another stay once renovations are complete. The room I booked was a king bed for 2. The interior design and decor was simply beautiful. I love love loved the black and white color scheme. There is only valet parking available bu there is a parking lot literally across the street so its not too much of an inconvenience. 20 a day. There was only one working elevator during renovations but for me it was not an inconvenience I have enough patience to wait. No big deal.
House keeping staff was not good. Hotel was being renovating so the atmoshere was horrible. Elevators were not in good condition.

Overall positive experience. Hotel was nice staff was very prefoasional and friendly. Also it was convenient to text staff for small questions. Was a little sad pool was not open during my stay and the bathroom was a bit tiny but otherwise positive experience will stay again.
Great location hip environment wonder lobby bar friendly staff.

Beautiful hotel. LOVED the hotel and room. Bummed they did n’t have the pool and gym ready but that ’s ok. I will def come back and stay here. The neighborhood is sketchy but looks like they are also rebuilding the area to clean it up. Very trendy and artistic hotel with truly sincere and helpful staff.

Nice trendy Remodel I really enjoyed the art show and exhibits here. Great amount of seating everywhere loved the motif of the bar bartenders. There was some live musicians playing it kinda had a beatniks feel about it. Total la hipster vibes. Great art all around and smooth fungshui.

Amazing stay. Very comfortable beds attentive staff but still manage to maintain the utmost sense of privacy. Beautiful architecture and there is live music in the lounge on the weekends so you need not even leave to find some nightlife. Wonderful stay we definitely can not wait to return.

Nice hotel some reviews say that this is a shady neighborhood. I would say it is just fine and convenient for downtown activities. the bathroom was small and there could be more lighting and a clock. Great artwork throughout. and we had the best time dancing downstairs wonderful atmosphere. I will stay here again.
